channel.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
channel.description:
Hello mopar
Today i wanna ask you guys
what do you want in a donator zone or as a feature Myself never donated to a rsps so i dont now what players want if you want share it what you want in a donator zone it would be great
dont post if you dont like this tread

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.description:
@1500 wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Your average player doesn’t want any “Donator” content at all.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

arham 4:

An island for the mostly greedy donators wanting d claws and over advantages. They do ::donatorzone they get stuck on an island and cant tele out.

Win

Read full topic

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

zyle1992:

Perhaps once a month you can hold a raffle for all donators, and they win some money, or armor, something.

OMFG another good idea :eek: MINE!!! ;D

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:13, topic:462861”]I joined RSPS for two things.

  1. Free items such as party hat
  2. Not to pay for any better content.

I would ONLY pay if I had confidence that the server would stay up for years and years from its current point.[/quote]

we all had that concept in our heads with matrix but that definitely did not go well

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The #1 cause of death for most online games, is the introduction of “pay-to-win” mechanics. The only reason RuneScape hasn’t been utterly destroyed by it, is because they employ different servers for paid content, and paid content can’t be used in an advantage over non-members. The only things that donators should get in return is perhaps, a mention in a Donator’s page on the website, if you have forums, perhaps a custom title/rank. Nothing more.

People should donate because they like your product, and want to support it. Perhaps once a month you can hold a raffle for all donators, and they win some money, or armor, something.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I joined RSPS for two things.

  1. Free items such as party hat
  2. Not to pay for any better content.

I would ONLY pay if I had confidence that the server would stay up for years and years from its current point.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @Ashley3 Ashley
item.description:
@Ashley3 wrote:

Give them membership, not a donor zone. With membership, give them more content and by more content, I mean; Access to better training areas, faster methods of making money and so on. Keep all the other(original) content free to use and just add simple things like that for players to enjoy once they donate to your server. Most players enjoy servers more when there’s things to do. So by adding something like this isn’t really recommended. You should keep everything free to use so that it’s fair for every player.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

I like the i deas i already have crowns for them but tge name change i already have a public command ::changename

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

If someone does donate, they don’t really deserve any reward; however, here are a few suggestions:

[ul][li]Ability to change username every month[/li]
[li]Recognition as a donator; crown or forum title[/li][/ul]

I can’t think of anything else that wouldn’t be counted as a huge benefit.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

No i dont have and never will add donator item for extra thing and i think your right but i am certenly not after the money i want ppl to enjoy the old time of runescape ( not so old lol) and have fun with playing unlikly rs and now i remember the time when nornal players coudnt do many thing while menbers could do anything and i dont want to be my server like that thnks

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature

item.title: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

thakillah:

I think you are right i might make some quest. some bosses and self made minigames for donator+ because donator want thing foe there money

That’s even worse than having Donor Shops. Go ahead and make Rings with extra statistics for Donors too, but don’t tell anyone about them. Make them keep on death while you’re at it. Let’s cut off half of the RuneScape map and give people who donate both halves. Split your Item configuration in half, this way you can give children with credit cards twice the items that normal players have! It’s totally up to you, but virtual goods in exchange for currency is paying to win. I’m not trying to belittle your ideas. I’m just telling you like it is.

TL;DR Doesn’t matter what I say if you’re after the $$. Good luck with those donator-only Minigames and Quests. Your players will love that.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you want in a donator zone or donator feature
